title: Some themes
review:
Themes:
  • Society favors couples
  • Love based on similarities between people
  • People desperate to find a partner
  • Partnering up as a game (tinder)
  • Some detachment from feelings
  • War between loners (those who dont want partners) and singles desperate to find partners
  • Loners hard on loners who strive to find a partner
  • People who want to find a partner, but fail, end up as a kind of lower species
